website_summaries.verdict: Works on all kinds of stainless steel surfaces, including outdoor grills and appliances.
pros: Uses plant-based ingredients to ensure a safe product to use anywhere
Works equally well as a polish and to remove fingerprints
Includes a microfiber cloth to enhance the value of the product
cons: Doesn't clean streaks as well as some other stainless steel cleaners

customer_reviews.title: FOUND OUT THE HARD WAY TO GO OLD SCHOOL
customer_reviews.text: I've tried to use several stainless steel cleaners on my expensive fridge. It kept getting worse. After buying this product, which did absolutely nothing, I realized, based on another reviewer, that indeed it was just polishing without cleaning it. It would just spread the dirt and oil all around! I went the old fashion way and used a paste of baking soda with water. I was scared at first but desperate! Using that solution, my fridge looks brand new! No scratches and it actually cleaned and shined it! Make sure you use a soft wet cloth to apply, soft wet cloth to rinse, and a dry soft cloth to dry. You'll be amazed and your welcome!
customer_reviews.author: rlew

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. A little bit goes a long way. The picture is worth a 1000 words.
customer_reviews.author: Shades49

customer_reviews.title: how did this product get all those stars?????
customer_reviews.text: With all the glowing reviews, I thought I had fianlly found a stainless cleaner that really works. Was I wrong. I followed the directions to the letter, and all I got was streaks, streaks, and more streaks. I tried it a couple of times, but nothing changed. I'm not sending it back, because that's such a pain, but I learned my lesson on this product the hard way.
customer_reviews.author: Connie L. Spanjer

customer_reviews.title: Better than most
customer_reviews.text: hmmm, okay, this is not a bad product. It actually helps repel fingerprints. The problem is when too much is applied or after it is applied for several weeks in a row, it is difficult to get it to buff in without leaving streaks. I used a microfiber cloth and had to turn it about 5 times to get everything buffed. I would say it's better than most but still not exactly perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Aniasco2010

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Finally found something that works
customer_reviews.text: I included a before and after. I think the photos tell it all. This product works really well. I cleaned the appliances yesterday and this morning the streaks on the dishwasher have not returned and the trash compactor still looks as great as my “after” photo.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch Cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: When this arrived, I couldn't wait to get this out of the box to use it! It worked like a charm- streak free and smells amazing! I joked with my brother and said "you know you're an adult when you get excited about a cleaning product haha!" Cool that the company is based out of NH, as that's where I was born & raised!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cleaner for my new Whirlpool stainless appliances
customer_reviews.text: Perfect cleaner for my new Whirlpool stainless appliances. I was somewhat skeptical with a few of these reviews talking about it either being greasy, leaving a film, etc. I haven't had ANY of those problems. It also seems to make it a bit fingerprint resistant as well. Since I cleaned my fridge down a month ago, I haven't had to do it again yet. I'm sure if I had kids it'd be a little different, but this stuff is where it's at. I've tried cheaper big-box store cleaners and they all take a lot of arm work to get the haze of the initial product to wipe off.
customer_reviews.author: W Fish

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Steel Cleaner and Polish
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our new dishwasher, which came smudged. It did an amazing job quickly and easily. It has been several days since I used it, and I believe the polish repels new finger prints. It is really good. Then I used it on our range hood (beautiful,) our double sinks--where it got out the yucky crud that collects around the place where the sink is sealed into the counter top, and our toaster--which I thought had rust spots that turned out not to be rust when this cleaner was used. I hope Therapy will be able to develop other cleaning products that are equally awesome to their stainless steel cleaner. I will definitely be a customer!
customer_reviews.author: dogsandcats13

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but....
customer_reviews.text: The product works wonderfully on stainless steel appliances and a lot goes a long way. The only thing I wish we were warned about is that the oils in the product and the cloth can permanently stain cabinetry. We now keep the cleaner in a Plastic container to protect our cabinets but the damage was done. Still recommend, however keep in a special container so you don’t ruin your cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: ColoradoFan

customer_reviews.title: Yup, therapeutic!
customer_reviews.text: I can't comment on the therapeutic benefits without doing a double-blind randomized controlled trial, but there's certainly psychological benefits in having a kitchen full of gleaming stainless. After reading the newspaper, I desperately need just one dang thing I can fix in this world! But seriously, it's the best stainless cleaner I've ever used. It's quick, smells great and the finish is perfect. It resists finger prints (and paw prints) for days. It was also a great idea they had to include the micro cleaning cloth as it does an excellent job as well. I probably wouldn't have thought of that. I plan to give these as gifts. Pretty funny!
customer_reviews.author: Designer MomTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I just bought all new stainless appliance for my newly remodeled kitchen, so I wanted something good to keep them looking clean. This spray made a mess of my fridge! It left oily streaks all over. I used Sray Way glass cleaner to to remove the product and streaks. I returned this product . I have no idea how some reviewers can give this product 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ipodcrazy

customer_reviews.title: Can also use on black enamel cooktops to resist dust
customer_reviews.text: I have one appliance (the fridge) that is not the newer fingerprint resistant stainless steel. I used this product ONCE on it when I got it a couple months ago to get rid of all the fingerprints and honestly, I haven't had to go back and clean it again. I've even had the fridge moved in and out of it's spot in order to fix a leak and repaint the baseboard. Still no obvious finger prints. I also use it on the black enamel of my range after I clean off spills and grease. This product helps to resist dust which was the thing I noticed most when I cleaned with regular cleaners. Great product and nice cloth too!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Tremayne

customer_reviews.title: Way more expensive and way less effective than big box store brands
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand the positive reviews of this stainless steel cleaner, at all. I have to spray and buff at least three times and then buff with a clean cloth at least three more times. Even then, the steel still looks unpolished. The cleaner does nothing to get rid of stains. To top it all off, it's way to pricey. Cheap box store stainless steel cleaners work with a third of the work for a third of the price. I legitimately have no idea how people are rating this so highly.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan K.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!! I use this for cleaning houses so I use it a lot, and it’s wonderful. Recently someone thought they had stains on the dishwasher that wouldn’t come off, but look what I got it to do! The people that are rating low probably are not using it correct. They wrote me very quickly when I messaged them about proper instructions. Spray directly on the surface, then use the cloth provided in the same direction of the grain, and then using that same same side without flipping the cloth over buffer in circles. Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Jazmine S.

customer_reviews.title: A complete waste of money / try e-cloths instead
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't clean or polish any better than a simple wipe with an e-cloth. Don't know what e-cloths are?  (No, I don't work for the company that make e-cloths or etc.)
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Not a great product
customer_reviews.text: Still left streaks and didn't clean well at all if it was something other than fingerprints. I am also unsure as to what exactly is therapeutic about the product. Did nothing but increase stress because of the streaks and the fact it wasn't a great cleaner. As far as the smell, had a slight lavender scent when first purchased but quickly faded. Now it has a waxy and unpleasant smell. Didn't even finish the first bottle before I threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher C.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but not great on heavily streaky areas
customer_reviews.text: It does the job but I have the regular weiman stainless steel wipes from the store and they seem to get the streaks out of my dishwasher more then this product.. This is a nice product that gets the job done on the fridge and any areas that are heavily streaky but doesn't seem to work as well on areas that get alot of water on it.
customer_reviews.author: JBLAKE

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Used other products where you had to rub and buff until your arm almost fell off. We've been doing a kitchen renovation and of course the refrigerator is right in the middle of everything, dust and dirty hands I thought I would never get it clean, I really wanted to buy a new refrigerator. I have an older GE profile fridge it has stainless steel panels so the fingerprints really show, but you spray the stuff on wipe it off and it's amazing, no fingerprints! Its been a week we're still in reno mode, either they're putting gloves on or using telekinesis to open the door. Not a spot! Love it buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Alice Cuevas

customer_reviews.title: Streaks, leaking and unhappy
customer_reviews.text: Terrible streaks. Where are these raving reviews coming from? As soon as I tried it the spray was extremely thick so I didn’t feel good about it already. Then after buffing it out.... SO MANY STREAKS. My fridge looks even worse than before. Not to mention, the bottle was leaking when opening the box. Not a good first impression. Nor does the product make up for it. So unhappy. !!!
customer_reviews.author: Gymcoach1

customer_reviews.title: I don't care for it...
customer_reviews.text: It left a film on my stainless steel appliances. I thought maybe I put too much on, so I have used it several times, using only a light amount, it doesn't seem to matter, still leaves a film. I have to use another cleaner to get this cleaner off. Very disappointed, for the price, I expected my appliances to shine with ease. I still have at least a half bottle, that will be wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Candee

customer_reviews.title: While this polish seems to give a good shine, it actually leaves a residue.
customer_reviews.text: I remodeled my home kitchen into a stainless steel one. It is challenging to keep the stainless surfaces look good. I thought this Therapy stainless cleaner would work great. When I used it it functions more like car polish. It leaves a film on the stainless material. While, it makes the metal look good, it actually wasn’t “clean”. When I applied Windex to clean the polish off, a lot of residue from the Therapy cleaner came off. For my purposes, I think Windex just gives a better clean surface look.
customer_reviews.author: JKN

customer_reviews.title: Streaks, Streaks, Streaks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product based on the reviews to make my life easier. It made it worse, streaks something awful. Trying to get the streaks is even more difficult. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Scoot

customer_reviews.title: I don’t even have words for how amazing the stainless steel cleaner is
customer_reviews.text: I don’t even have words for how amazing the stainless steel cleaner is! I just thought I would be doomed to a fingerprint stained fridge for the rest of my small childrens’ time at home. I have tried everything from sprays to special microfiber cloths, and there were always shadows of where the handprints and fingerprints had been. The very first time I used this it cleaned off two years of three kids’ fingerprint smudges that I thought were permanent!!!! It took a matter of seconds. AH-MAZING. I just spray, then wipe with the grain, then take a clean side of the cloth and buff over the spot. It is a magical cleaner!!!
customer_reviews.author: ZMomUtah

customer_reviews.title: This WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I have used many, many products to keep my stainless steel appliances clean and streak free. The last product is used was W-D 40. I did just an okay job, took a lot of rubbing and I did not like using W-D 40 in my kitchen. When I first sprayed Therapy Stainless Steel on my fridge, I was blown away. I did such a beautiful job with absolutely beautiful results. I did not have to rub and rub and go over and over my appliances to get the them streak free. It left my appliances really beautiful and now I dont dread cleaning my kitchen anymore. This is absolutely the BEST product I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Weber

customer_reviews.title: Great polish for stainless steel!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! We have been using it for almost a year and a half. So here are some tips...LESS is more on my fridge. I don't spray the fridge directly with product. I use the microfiber cloth dampened with the a bit of polish and buff in circles until shiny. On my range hood, which gets nasty with dust and grease, I spray product and remove with a paper towel. THEN add more spray and polish and buff. When you are buffing, make sure your section of cloth is dry! Otherwise you are not removing excess product.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: No more smears!
customer_reviews.text: I have a stainless steel refrigerator that I've had for about 8 years. Cleaning the thing has been a bear! I used everything, including a cleaner that claimed to be for cleaning stainless appliances, but with little results. For years, there were what I thought were permanent smears all over the front of my fridge. When I got this cleaner, I used it immediately and those smears came off at once. The fridge looked almost new. I wish I had known about this a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: MissGoody2Shoes

customer_reviews.title: leaves a "sheen"
customer_reviews.text: i use this product to clean my stove top, my microwave, the outside of my dishwasher and the outside of my refrigerator. i like the scent of this product. i am not crazy am the "sheen" that it leaves. maybe that means i need to keep rubbing it in longer? or maybe the towel that it comes with isn't the best. not sure. but, i think finishing the bottle first before i fully commit to saying whether i like or dislike this product.
customer_reviews.author: melanie

customer_reviews.title: It's the best cleaner and polisher for stainless steel I can find
customer_reviews.text: It's the best cleaner and polisher for stainless steel I can find. The secret is to spray it on, lightly wipe and lety set 5 - 10 min, then buff it off. Don't forget to go with the steel grain.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stainless steel cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this simply based on the reviews and this stuff is awesome! I have 2 little kids who leave smudges and fingerprints all over my stainless appliances and the tiniest amount of this cleaner erases the mess and leaves a beautiful shine. Often after a few sprays there is enough spray in the cloth that I can clean the rest of my appliances without using any more from the bottle and the other side of the cloth is great for buffing to a shine. I highly recommend this cleaner!
customer_reviews.author: LK28

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and makes the appliances look so much better
customer_reviews.text: We got this product because while stainless steel appliances look so nice when you first get them, as soon as you start using them you get fingerprints galore. All of the 'home remedy' tricks we tried were annoying, or so labor intensive as to be overly frustrating, so this product has been wonderful. It takes only a few minutes to clean all the appliances and make them look brand new again, great for when company comes over and you want to pretend like you always live in a magazine spread for home rather than the comfortable way you normally do :-)
customer_reviews.author: Anton Stocker

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried many brand named products, guaranteed to keep my stainless steel appliances shiny, and smudge free. None, not one, can compare to Therapy Premium Stainless steel cleaner. It’s a two step application, but the extra couple of minutes is well worth it. Streak feee, pleasant smell, and most of all staying power. I cleaned all my appliances about 12 days ago, following the directions, and with the exception of wiping down the handles, they look as shiny and fingerprint free as the first day I used the product. I hope over time I continue to be as impressed with this product as I am today. I will definitely purchase again and recommend without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: My husband opened the box when it arrived and said “Oh whoopee another waste of money”
customer_reviews.text: I never believed in magic before now. I have tried every method of cleaning my new stainless steel appliances from furniture polish down to cooking oil, and everything else that internet had to offer, all with the same results streaks and more streaks. My husband opened the box when it arrived and said “Oh whoopee another waste of money”, showed him didn’t you Therapy. Spotless stainless steel in my kitchen with no effort at all, this stuff is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: In my experience, cleaning products usually need to be pretty strong chemicals that require care when applying. When faced with options, I usually buy the chemical with the most skull and cross bones, warning labels and danger symbols I can find. I figure the more volatile and poisonous the chemical, the better it will work! So I was skeptical about this product when it was billed as a plant based chemical on the other end of the toxicity spectrum. I decided to try it because of the many positive reviews. I'm glad I did. It works great! I wouldn't use it as a mouth wash but it certainly isn't as harsh as other cleaners I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: How nice of you to follow up on my delivery of Therapy Stainless Steel Cleaner. I received it, as promised, on the 20th. I tried it right away as what I was using left streaks and spots (I did better just using plain water). However, Therapy has proven to be superior and I couldn't be more pleased. No streaks or spots and it seems to repel new fingerprints or water marks. I have recommended it to my son whose cleaning lady was not pleased with whatever she was using. I am sure you will be getting another customer. Thank you for your consideration and excellent product. Alice D.
customer_reviews.author: finney

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: First time I've used something like this. We have a new stainless steel stove and washing with soap and wiping with paper towel didn't do the trick. Then I tried soap and microcloth, better but not the final result I was looking for. I did some research on Amazon and found THERAPY. I bought Therapy Stainless Steel Cleaner and Polish solution and it it made a huge difference.. Even shined up my stainless steel sink that wasn't looking that great after 16 years. I definitely give it 5 out of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Candy Turnbull

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Therapy works !! I was skeptical of some bad reviews. I received it today and tried it right away--very pleased!!! In Photo 1 I used product on top half of dishwasher to show/compare to bottom half. In Photo 2 product used on entire dishwasher door In Photo 3 product used on entire surface stove/range door-so shiney! In Photo 4 product used on top French doors but not on bottom drawer to show difference.
customer_reviews.author: bookshelftexts

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This worked great on our stainless steel fridge! Brought back the shine right away. The trick I think is to work in sections so you can work quickly, and like others said go with the grain. I started with the top of the fridge door, and when I was done I sprayed the rest of the door. It worked great. Every now and then I wipe fingerprints off with the cloth that's included. Will probably use once a month to on the fridge and my other stainless steel stuff to keep the shine. Bonus is that is smells really nice. Not like other household cleaners. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: BK Shopper

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR REAL STAINLESS STEEL
customer_reviews.text: This product was VERY DISAPPOINTING!!! After scrubbing my REAL stainless steel JENN-AIR refrigerator, and it was shining and squeaky-clean, I applied the “polish” with this product... it left the fridge smudgy and streaky!!! And yes, I polished it with the microfiber cloth that came with the product! I would not recommend this for REAL stainless steel appliances!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Herr

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT NOW!
customer_reviews.text: YOU GUYS! This stuff is nuts! I worked at Lowe's for 2 years as the appliance specialist. It was a running joke that nothing would ever get the finger print stains out of the stainless steel and "fingerprint resistant" appliances. I HAVE FOUND THE SOLUTION! This stuff makes your stainless no matter the age, or brand, look BETTER THAN NEW! I couldn't even believe it the first time I used it. But it has continued to wow me with each additional use! And the awesome thing? You hardly have to use any, which means the bottle will last forrreeeevvvveeeer! Yippee! I am screaming from the rooftops to all of my old appliance customers, BUY THIS!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alex VanDenBurg

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised
customer_reviews.text: Great product that delivered on promises. Cleaned my fridge, dishwasher, stove and microwave and all looked great. I found that immediately after using the product there was a slight greasy feeling that when touched led to fingerprints but when I left the surface alone to dry and came back in a few hours (I left the house to run errands) there was no greasy feeling and although it didn’t totally prevent fingerprints, it was more resistant. I’m very happy with the product, I’ll continue to use and most likely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Erin V

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I was bit skeptical about how well this product will do against cleaning some highly smudged stainless surfaces in our kitchen. I was burnt before using other highly advertised products that proved to be nothing but duds when put to the challenge. But this one came out in shining armor. Was very pleased to find a nice polish and cleaned, shiny surfaces with the use of this spray. The aroma of the oil is mild and pleasant too. Also appreciate the microfiber cloth that comes in the package. Overall very satisfied so far.
customer_reviews.author: Expatriot

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few days ago and I'm already in love. I grew up in a house with stainless steel appliances and I have so many memories of my mom getting so mad that nothing cleaned the stainless steel. Now I live in an apartment with stainless steal appliances and found myself getting mad too! I told her when I ordered this and she literally said "Good luck. Nothing works". Well this does! I just texted her my before and after of my oven as proof. If I recommended this to my mom, I'd recommend it to you too!
customer_reviews.author: Allison M.

customer_reviews.title: Wow, my Refrigerator and Microwave.....
customer_reviews.text: have never looked so good. This product works it shines up my Samsung Refrigerator shines and cleans up just like it did when first delivered. Introduced the product to my sister in law and she was amazed she is now buying the product, this is a must have for any Stainless Kitchen appliance you have. I've tried everything under the sun they are all now in the trash as this Therapy Premium Stainless Steel Cleaner & Polish is my go to product when cleaning. Everything including dried up jelly wipes up clean and shiny. Get this you wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It seems to make my stainless steel sticky.
customer_reviews.text: Food seems to stick to the bottom now, more than before. Although it looks nice after polishing, not sure this is the right product for me.
customer_reviews.author: ESR

customer_reviews.title: OBSESSED
customer_reviews.text: I had been cleaning my stainless steel with soap and water or stainless-safe all purpose cleaner prior to using this product. With the previous methods, I always ended up with streaks and a cloudy appearance. This stuff is a GAME CHANGER. It leaves stainless steel glistening like it’s fresh out of the box. The scent is amazing, and because it has coconut oil in it, it leaves my hands feeling moisturized and pampered after using it. If you are question whether to buy this, take the leap of faith. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: What the what?!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try this product after seeing all the amazing reviews. We just bought a brand new stainless steel fridge. It was a big deal for us and I've been babying it the last few days. First time using this product it left even more streaks and the microfiber towel scratched our BRAND NEW FREAKING FRIDGE?!?!?! I'm hoping if I use a different product it may come off but everything I've tried hasn't worked..... My husband is going to kill me!
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Hit and miss
customer_reviews.text: We have Jenn Aire stainless appliances in our kitchen. This product worked wonders for the dishwasher, but it did not work well on the refrigerator or the range hood. I guess it depends on the exact stainless that was used on the appliance. I think it is worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: D. Garner

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Produce a Streak-Free Shine
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand any good reviews of this product. I shook the bottle well, but it will not wipe off streak-free, no matter what type of cloth I use. This is on good Samsung stainless steel appliances, so I'm sure it's not because of the quality of the stainless.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Actually works
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually post a review but for this I want to. I have tried many stainless steel cleaners and none have actually cleaned without streaks, most don’t even clean off marks! This cleaner works. Have had a water line down the dishwasher for almost 2 years. I have tried many cleaners including homemade (which I use for most cleaning, peroxide/rubbing alcohol/baking soda...) I purchased this with serious doubt that it would take care of this specific spot on the dishwasher. I actually cleaned it off and it looks brand new again! I have even recommended it to friends already and I’ve only had it for 2 days!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Wren

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing! Just wait for it to dry!
customer_reviews.text: I was really skeptical when I first used this product but after it dried on the stainless steel, my appliances look brand new. This is truly an amazing product. I just ordered another one for my mom. I tried just about everything in the book to clean the finger prints off of my refrigerator and dish washer. This product did the trick. Be sure to really buff the surface in order to get the best results. It also looks better when it’s completely dry. As you put it on and work it around it looks like it isn’t doing anything. Then when it’s dry, like magic all of the water stains and finger prints vanish. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: C. Huber

customer_reviews.title: The Hype in the Reviews Are True!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and wondered if the product really was as good as the hype. Let me tell you, it actually is! It doesn’t streak, like my old product did. It applies evenly, unlike my old product did. It lasts a full week plus on the stainless steel without having to be reapplied, unlike my old product did. It also doesn’t leave a thick residue on my hands, unlike my old product. Overall I’m extremely impressed. You should purchase with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Samster

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Efficient
customer_reviews.text: In a nutshell this is by far the best stainless cleaner I have ever used, not that I have used all that many. Only used Therapy a couple of times but wow, wipe on, wipe off, done. My previous cleaner worked OK but frequently I had to hit it a second time to get the SS clear and clean. So far this has been a one wipe/one buff deal and clean as a whistle. So easy and so good. Thanks, Therapy!
customer_reviews.author: RAM

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner is Amazing. I bought this because none of my go to stainless cleaners worked on my GE Cafe appliances. After searching amazon and reading the reviews on this product I tried it. WOW. So very easy to remove, streak free and smells okay. It's not oily like some of them and buffs off effortlessly. It has been 4 days since I cleaned my appliances and they still look just cleaned. It really does seem to repel fingerprints as some others have said. I highly recommend this product and will be ordering again. The cloth it comes with is also very good. Just remember to shake it before using. I wish I took a before picture!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: BEST YET !
customer_reviews.text: This product is the BEST !!.....it has my fridge, stove, microwave, coffee machine, and sink facets gleaming and it does not show finger marks....this was used about 2 weeks ago and they are still gleaming.....trust me, I have used just about every product on the market.....
customer_reviews.author: Pookie Porker

customer_reviews.title: Truly streak free shine!! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner does what it says. I was literally desperate to find something that really cleans my stainless kitchen appliances. They always looked awful & it frustrated me. I’ve tried numerous stainless steel cleaners over the years and all leave spots and streaks behind. I even used Dawn dish detergent with some success but not 100% satisfied until using this Therapy cleaner. Beautiful shiny finish that lasts for days and resists fingerprints. Definitely worth the $!
customer_reviews.author: KMG

customer_reviews.title: Trust the great reviews....
customer_reviews.text: Just received mine today and am impressed. I’ve tried several different stainless cleaners/polish sprays and wipes and thought I’d just have resign myself to dull and streaky stainless. I’ve been using vinegar water solution and microfiber cloths but miss the shine my appliances had when they were new. This stuff works great and my appliances look like new again. I’m hoping continued use provides the same great results. I read about this in an article about highly rated product on Amazon and see why this was on their list. I also like that it’s not full of chemicals and is made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: B. Sells

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Stainless Steel
customer_reviews.text: I manage commercial property. And I have a lot of stainless to keep looking good. I've tried many products over the years, and so far this is the best. It works best if you don't put too much on. Start using very little and you'll figure it out quickly. And my cleaners love the product. They say it's ten times easier to get great results than with past products. While it might cost more than some other products, it really goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Thruppence

customer_reviews.title: Fixed streaks, spots and previous product shortcomings.
customer_reviews.text: This works when a previous product did not. Thought at first it was just the cloth that came with it but when I used this cloth with the prior product, it did only a slightly better job. When used with this cleaner, it made my fridge like new. I was putting up with spots and streaks left behind by the other cleaner but this one lifted those blemishes and left the fridge door looking near perfect. Smells good too.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Faranda

customer_reviews.title: First time user and user for life
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is like gold for your stainless steel. I am a new stainless steel appliance package owner and was researching what to buy to keep that crap nice and shiny. This stuff works and smells pretty good, too. It's not like that wax crap you use to polish brass. Damn I hate polishing brass. Now I'm triggered.
customer_reviews.author: Savior-X

customer_reviews.title: A must have for all your stainless cleaning needs
customer_reviews.text: I’m a long time Weiman user of their various stainless cleaners and they pale in comparison to the effectiveness of this miracle stainless spray. Not only does it clean and polish but I’m finding it repeals smudges.
customer_reviews.author: TammyM

customer_reviews.title: The Best Stainless Steel Cleaner & Polish I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I have been struggling to find a SS cleaner and polish for my appliances for 15 years. Every other product streaked, or smeared. I was very skeptical about this product but gave it a shot. I sprayed on the cleaner and wiped with the enclosed microfiber cloth. I could not believe the results. My appliances turned out clean and polished with no streaking. It was that easy! No more frustration trying to make appliances look great!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne0629

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY for stainless steel appliances.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing is all I can say about this product. I moved into my home with a stainless refrigerator as part of the sale and it had water spots, discoloration, and other film on it. This cleaner, after two applications, completely removed all of the mentioned stains and discoloration. My wife was very happy, and if she approved this product then I have to write this review. Buy it now for all your stainless steel appliances.
customer_reviews.author: G. Snow

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this product!!
customer_reviews.text: Mainly it did not work! Was impossible to use. Needed to use a lot of elbow grease to buff it, but it didn't even clean it! Left streaks and smudges that were on it, but made them more obvious! Very displeased!!! Tried it on my refrigerator, stove, and dishwasher. Previously had used Steel Meister for years and it was excellent! Unfortunately, can't find it anywhere now. Would have given it 0 stars in each category and overall rating, but couldn't!
customer_reviews.author: Gwanma

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product works exactly as it says!! For those of you that are getting film build up it's because you have to buff it out at the end! It clearly says to clean it and then buff it at the end! I was a little leery to buy this product because everyone said it left a film on there refrigerator but if you just follow the instructions it works perfect
customer_reviews.author: home_made_honey

customer_reviews.title: Everyone can use some good therapy!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many stainless products and all were horrible! I’ve spent too much money & time looking for a product to remove fingerprints & overflow from door water & ice. Finally I found Therapy Stainless & it’s wonderful. It’s easy to use, easy to store and gets all the icky off my stainless appliances. The best is I don’t have to wipe everything down everyday! I can use Therapy twice a week and it looks 100% better than the other products I used daily and sometimes twice a day! This is also the 1st product I’ve ordered that came with a really nice (polishing, buffering) cloth! A+ Therapy.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Segall

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised how nice this worked for a relatively organic product
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how nice this worked for a relatively organic product . I cleaned the sink, small appliances and our stainless garbage cans. I only gave it 4 stars because the shine doesn't last very long and it didn't clean as well as other products.
customer_reviews.author: Van's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Therapy Stainless Steel Cleaner and Polish
customer_reviews.text: After I used the entire bottle of stainless cleaner that came with my appliances. I bought a bottle of the Weiman. What a disappointment! It was fairly useless and I had to hold my breath when I sprayed it, because the chemical fumes (disguised as a nice scent) were closing my lungs. Since that was the brand my store carried I was at a loss. So I went to Amazon and found Therapy. I read the reviews and decided to try it. WOW! It really cleans, shines, and polishes. Now when I run water it beads up on the side of the sink. Great product! Non-toxic, too!
customer_reviews.author: California girl

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have a JennAir built-in refrigerator with a stainless steel front. There were streaks going down the front underneath the ice maker/water dispenser from years of use. I couldn't get them off with anything. I decided to try this after seeing an article about it on facebook and, after using it, the streaks are completely gone! Very easy to use, too.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Sue

customer_reviews.title: Magical
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AMAZING! I am def not Martha Stewart and my stainless steel appliances always gave it away when I used other products. Trust me I have tried ALL of the other cleaning products and the end result was always lots of steaks and just dull. Now that I have this little bottle of magic, my appliances actually look clean after I clean it!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: I can't even tell you how amazing this spray is
customer_reviews.text: I can't even tell you how amazing this spray is!!! I was skeptical, but it didn't disappoint. My husband cleaned our appliances the same day the shipment arrived and within minutes they went from being COVERED in fingerprints and debris to being just as clean as the day we bought them. The company emailed me to see how it was and my interactions we them were insanely friendly! Definitely try it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shine and long lasting finish!
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product I ordered a bottle to ship to my mom in Fl! Very impressed. I had trouble in the past with streaks on my stainless refrigerator after wiping off finger prints. Once I used this product on the entire fridge any slight prints wipe off with a damp cloth and dry with microfiber. Very fast and no streaks!
customer_reviews.author: Dianna

customer_reviews.title: No Spray Nozzle
customer_reviews.text: My order did not include a spray nozzle. I’ve been putting it directly onto the provided terry cloth. I don’t know if this makes any difference as the instructions say, “spray on.” I’m giving the product 2 stars simply because it didn’t come with a vital accessory that the instructions clearly call fore. Therefore, I have no basis for a proper review as I’m not able to use the product as instructed.
customer_reviews.author: AmyFH.

customer_reviews.title: Finally! A stainless steel appliance polish that works!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product right away. I have used a couple other products and homemade remedies searching for an easier way to shine up the appliances. This is it! Easy to use, a nice cloth is included and smells good. Now, even my dishwasher is fingerprint free. I liked it so much I gave the bottle to my daughter to try and now I need to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a difference!
customer_reviews.text: The only stainless steel appliance in my kitchen is a toaster oven, but the smudges and fingerprints on it were annoying and resisted other cleaning products. I even tried rubbing it with a small amount of olive oil, which is often recommended as a way to make stainless look good again. It works, but I figured that over time, I'd end up with baked-on gunk as subsequent layers of oil fused with the hot oven surface. This product, while pricey, did a beautiful job of cleaning the stainless. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: BfloGal

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner and polisher!
customer_reviews.text: I did not know what to expect. Having used other stainless steel cleaners, I really wondered if it would just like the other cleaners. This cleaner works very well. A very good cleaner, leaves my stainless steel looking wonderful. Easy to work into surface, leaving a very clean polished surface with depth added to the appearance. Highly recommend this for your valuable appliances!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Best Stainless Steel Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I tried this based on a review from someone who had tried three different stainless steel cleaners and this was her favorite. I whole heartedly agree, I love it. It comes with the cleaner and a microfiber cloth. I used it on my refrigerator and dishwasher and it cleaned and polished it beautifully. Best of all it left absolutely no streaks. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: mcgivy

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is super.
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant about trying it. Had been using Windex to clean my stainless fridge. It was starting to look like crap. I gave this stuff a shot. Let me tell you, night and day difference. The fridge looks like new again. I used this stuff once and it's been about 3 weeks and the fridge still looks great. There's no longer fingerprints. So whatever this stuff is, it works and works well.
customer_reviews.author: gilligan

customer_reviews.title: So good
customer_reviews.text: True, I’ve only ever used one stainless cleaner other than this one, but this not only blows that other one out of the water, but it leaves me not caring to look for another one. This actually cleans the marks (like fingerprints) unlike the other brand that, despite its claims, only polished. I would have to rub and rub to try to buff out the prints. This is more like washing windows or a counter. Wipe a couple of times with moderate pressure and done! The smell is pleasant too. The rag it comes with is great. I have nothing bad at all to say about this.
customer_reviews.author: Erica K

customer_reviews.title: Streaks after applying
customer_reviews.text: I am really confused by these reviews as I recently purchased this product and it has left large streaks all across my stainless steel appliances. I have followed the directions as specified, and even tried wiping it different ways to see if it made any difference. No such luck.
customer_reviews.author: Tennis3

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: This product is just meh for us. It leaves streaks sometimes and leaves behind a thick residue so that when I use it on our stainless steel cabinet handles, I have to take an extra step and wipe them down a second time to get the sticky residue off. It’s bothersome. I’ll keep using it for the time being and keep an eye out for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Lena Muldoon

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: I got this cleaner based on the reviews and so far it is working well. I have to say that the first time I used it, it seemed to take a lot of work to get all of the streaks gone, but now that I have done a coat and polished it up, the later cleanings seem to go easier. I was hoping the bottle would be a little larger so we will see how far this goes.
customer_reviews.author: Yarrow10

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product. Get it
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. First used on a sub zero refrigerator door. Beautiful with very little effort. Will try on ovens next but am sold on the refrigerator if that’s all I use it on.
customer_reviews.author: Davy h

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried the store-bought sprays and wipes for stainless steel. They all have an off-putting scent and feel thick and are messy to apply. I saw this one recommended in an article and decided to give it a try. It’s awesome!! The smell is light and pleasant and it is easy to spray and wipe. So glad I gave this one a try!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Hoffmann

customer_reviews.title: Shiny things are great
customer_reviews.text: I’d hate to admit it, but I’m a little obsessed with this stuff. I find myself seeking out any small piece of stainless steel, just to polish it. Hell, I even polished the toaster! Unnecessary, but it looks brand new again! Almost time for another bottle! Also, I love that it comes with its own micro fiber towel!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron F.

customer_reviews.title: Works well and is safe to use!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try Therapy because it is not toxic whereas the product I had been using is. I tried it out on my stainless appliances and it worked very well! I am pleased! Even though it doesn't work quite as well as the other brand I had, Elco, I am quite happy to use a product that doesn't have harsh and toxic chemicals. The slight difference in performance is more than made up for by its safety.
customer_reviews.author: M. Elder

customer_reviews.title: Hidden gem! Best stainless steel product I’ve used to date!
customer_reviews.text: I have used and thoroughly enjoyed the product. Hands down! This is the best working stainless steel cleaner and polisher I have ever used! I have used name brand stainless steel cleaners, wipes and polished and they were oily or left a residue or didn’t even clean my appliances. I’m thoroughly happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: FitChick

customer_reviews.title: Amazed!  The unnamed blue glass cleaner just doesn't cut it, this stuff is legit.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had a before and after photo of my GE stainless steel French door fridge. Fingerprints galore and would get only so clean wiping down w/ unnamed blue glass cleaner. This stuff made my fridge and dishwasher look brand new and smelling great (assuming you like coconuts). Very little effort required too, just spray and wipe w/ a microfiber towel.
customer_reviews.author: Zsoldier

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a wonderful stainless fridge and the only negative was the smudges and fingerprints. I tried a few options to resolve the mess without success. Therapy did the trick and was very easy to use. In fact it seems to have placed a barrier to smudges and fingerprints. Glad that I purchased this product.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Goes on Easy
customer_reviews.text: This product was my second choice. The first, another highly rated spray, was available at big box stores for $6 but it didn't yield a uniform finish and smelled overly sweet. Therapy solves both of those problems (and you pay for that). Do use the enclosed microfibre cloth, and it's best to use a 2nd cloth to remove the dried polish and buff the surface.
customer_reviews.author: Bart Windrum

customer_reviews.title: Good for maintaining stainless steel appliances, not good for hard water spots.
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for maintenance cleaning of your stainless steel appliances, this product is among the best we've used. For our refrigerator with hard water stains, the product was ineffective and the refrigerator looked no different after applying the product multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! Not sure what else to say about this product but it works absolutely awesome! I have used so many brand named cleaners before and all of them had some sort of issue. This was so easy to apply - no going back and re-wiping an area! It removed all drip marks and fingerprints immediately. So glad I finally found this!
customer_reviews.author: KMO0217

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! Seriously!. Grandkids had fingerprints, food and whatever all over my appliances (which I totally don't mind...rather have my grandies here), and this took everything right off! I don't think you'll regret spending a few extra dollars for this...I know I didn't....
customer_reviews.author: Janice C. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Therapy Stainless Steel cleaner - extraordinaire
customer_reviews.text: This product goes above and beyond any other cleaner i have tried. My appliances (all 8 years old) look like new and seem to resist fingerprints. It is wonderful on my new stainless sink also. Highly recommend this product, and it is also a safe product to use environmentally.
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: Works great, price is too high. Doesn’t easily buff out
customer_reviews.text: I’ve added pictures of how beautiful my fridge looks. In the pictures one side was cleaned with therapy, the other side not (dispenser side). Leaves a beautiful shine. However I gave 3 stars for not being easy to remove. You really have to put in some elbow grease if you want to properly buff the cleaner out.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Malave

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and did its job more than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I will definitely recommend your product to my family, friends, coworkers, husbands co-workers and every diy that I know in my life!!!! Have been desperate, trying to use magic wipes, toothbrush, sodas, and everything you could think about that’s recommended for cleaning tough stains... and all along... I only need to use this product?! Very very satisfied!!!! 👍👍👍👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Penny pincher mom

customer_reviews.title: No more fingerprints!
customer_reviews.text: Worked well! Cleaned and shined better than I expected honestly. My kitchen now looks great for Christmas with my stainless steel appliances shining. And so far no fingerprints after 2 days since I cleaned with it which is definitely a plus with 2 little ones always leaving finger prints on my stainless steel!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Magical product
customer_reviews.text: I popped on amazon and searched stainless steel cleaner and this caught my eye so I thought I'd try it. Used this for the first time last night on my dirty, water spotted dishwasher and in less than 2 minutes it was shining like new! I love the natural ingredients and smell - I'm really happy to have found this product! Now my mom won't have to tell me how streaky my stainless is when she comes over haha!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I have struggled with cleaning the stainless steel surfaces of all my kitchen appliances. This works! Plus seems to protect them from fingerprints for a long time. I have heard back from many of my friends who I have recommended it to and they tell me how much they like it.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Munger

customer_reviews.title: exceeded my expectations and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product and they have been met if not exceeded. With only a small amount of product it cleans and polishes without leaving streaks. There is not a lot of rubbing involved, just wiping on and a few stokes to polish off. I am very pleased with the product and have purchased it again for my daughter. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: J amz online

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Having a new stainless steel kitchen (including sink) I was looking for a good product for keeping prints under control. This product works great and is long lasting. I use it in the sink and it keeps the sink free from water spots for a week or more. Works well on the refrigerator and stove also.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Therapy Premium Stainless Steel Cleaner & Polish - Includes Large Microfiber Cloth, 16 fl oz
feature_bullets: Unique blend of plant-based ingredients delivers superior results that clean and protect in one easy step
Removes streaks, smudges, and fingerprints from all of your stainless steel surfaces
Includes a 14 x 14 inch microfiber cloth to use with the 16 ounce Therapy stylish pump bottle
Immaculate cleaning and polishing of stainless refrigerators, stoves, sinks, dishwashers, and microwaves
Works great on outdoor stainless grills and appliances due to protective properties of cleaning formula

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars4,138 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
